article: There is a zoo in our city. My parents often take me there on _ . I like animals. I have a lot of   toy animals in my room. In the _   , I can see the tigers, elephants, monkeys, pandas, bears, snakes, and many other  _  . Some animals are friendly, but some are not. Tigers, bears and some snakes are _  , that is why they have to stay in _  . But I do not think it is good for animals to stay in cages . They should be free. The animals in cages can't be _  . I think the most interesting animals in the zoo are the dolphins. I like _   them swim and jump. They swim so fast and jump so high. They can play with a ball. They can stand up and walk _   water! They are very _  to people. If you fall into water and can't swim, they may come to help you.
